name: Ubiquitous Legal Technology
tag_list: legal, arrest, android, lawyer, emergency, consumer
overview:
LawyerUp allows people to get quality legal representation in 15 minutes, guaranteed.

In a legal emergency, such as arrest, every minute counts and mistakes matter. Getting quality legal representation takes time and access to information resources unavailable in a legal emergency.

LawyerUp users sign-up and securely store important information, such as credit card information, that they can access with one call to 877-72-LAWUP. They also provide emergency contact information that can be very important in a legal emergency.

In a legal emergency, our operators confirm identity and collect important information about the legal emergency. The eligible lawyers in our network are messaged, and the first lawyer available is assigned the case.

All the lawyers on our network are pre-screened by us to ensure high ethical standards and professional competence.

LawyerUp is entirely user-supported. No lawyer ever pays us to join the network or receive a case.

Users join LawyerUp and access their accounts at our website or via our “LawyerUp” Android app.
